name: ORDER_RAD_MODS
description: ORDER_RAD_MODS stores the list of modifiers that were added within radiology as opposed to standard order entry.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of modifiers on an order added in radiology information system.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
